title: 有关新版启动器（正版）的问题
author: Hallon
txt_content:
以前我用旧版启动器好好的，现在一用新版，一点“多人游戏”就崩溃。版本1.8 p.s:1.8.1、1.8.3都是这样。错误日志：
[0218/053824:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(186)] game/avf (Client thread) info LWJGL Version: 2.9.4

[0218/053831:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(186)] game/bno (Client thread) info Reloading ResourceManager: Default

[0218/053832:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(186)] game/game () error If on Windows, make sure to provide all of the necessary dll's as specified in the twitchsdk README. Also, make sure to set the PATH environment variable to point to the directory containing the dll's.
  <log4j:Event logger="avf" timestamp="1487367512039" level="ERROR" thread="Client thread">
    <log4j:Message><![CDATA[Couldn't initialize twitch stream]]></log4j:Message>
  </log4j:Event>

[0218/053832:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(186)] launcher/monitor (Process Monitor) error expected <

[0218/053832:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(186)] game/bpy (Sound Library Loader) info Starting up SoundSystem...

replies.author: yuudachi
replies.txt_content: 重新下载一次游戏看看，也许是游戏的库文件没有下载完全

replies.author: Hallon
replies.txt_content:
yuningning520 发表于 2017-2-18 09:41
重装java https://www.java.com/zh_CN/download/manual.jsp
请问是要装哪一个版本的JAVA（我现在用的是1.8.0）?

replies.author: yuningning520
replies.txt_content:
Hallon 发表于 2017-2-25 15:03
请问是要装哪一个版本的JAVA（我现在用的是1.8.0）?
卸载再安装，最新的java8就行
